Rarefação com os dados BCI

```{r}
S<-specnumber(BCI)
(raremax <- min(rowSums(BCI)))
Srare <- rarefy(BCI, raremax)
plot(S, Srare, xlab = "Observed No. of Species", ylab = "Rarefied No. of Species")

abline(0, 1)

rarecurve(BCI, step = 20, sample = raremax, col = "blue", cex = 0.6)


```
